segments.text: The boy is climbing that two-step stool as if he's scaling a mountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m already nervous just watching him; the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hands stretch toward the cookie jar, determination etched on his face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so eager, but she should know better than to trust him on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pit in my stomach as I realize they’re both breaking the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They have no idea of the potential disaster they’re flirting with.
segments.speaker: PAR
